sentences.sContent: As she closed the door, she heard Tom exchanging good-natured banter with Jane.
sentences.sCn: 她关门时听见汤姆与简在开着善意的玩笑。

remMethod.val: 绊他 → 打趣， 玩笑

words.tran: 戏谑地；嘲弄地；半开玩笑地

trans.tranOther: friendly conversation in which people make a lot of jokes with, and amusing remarks about, each other
